title: Getting Started: Coding on Java Compilers Online

sections.title: What is Java?
sections.content: Java is a high-level, class-based, and object-oriented programming language. With its 'Write Once, Run Anywhere' (WORA) capability, Java code can run on any system equipped with the Java Virtual Machine (JVM), offering platform independence. It's widely used for web, mobile, and enterprise applications.

list.title: Versatility
list.content: Java is used across Android development, desktop applications, web apps using Servlets/JSPs, and enterprise software.

list.title: Community and Support
list.content: Java has a huge global developer community, offering support via forums, tutorials, and libraries.

list.title: Job Opportunities
list.content: Java developers are consistently in demand in tech companies of all sizes, ensuring job security and growth.
